items.title: Welcome!
items.text: Need help on something server related? This guide will help.

items.title: Join the Server
items.text:
Ready to jump in? Click the button below to join our Discord server!

Join our Discord Server

items.title: Topics
items.text:
• Getting Help - Having trouble? Start here.
  • Channel Directory - Learn where to post.

items.title: Channel Directory
items.text: Our server is organized into categories to keep conversations focused.

items.title: üì¢ Information
items.text:
• #News: Stay up to date with the latest server announcements.
  • Rules: Please read them carefully.
  • #Roles: Here is where you can pick personal roles.

items.title: üí¨ General
items.text:
• #Lounge: Our main chat
  • #DM-Requests: Where you can ask people to DM. Make sure to check their roles please.
  • #RP-Requests: Where you can ask people to RP. Make sure to check their roles please.
  • #Confess: Where you can make anonymous confessions! The bot will ban you if anything illegal is said though. So don't be too hasty please.

items.title: Help & Support
items.text: Need assistance? Here is how to get the help you need.

items.title: Frequently Asked Questions
items.text:
Q: How can I see the server? Check out the #rules channel, which will contain instructions on how to see all the channels.

Q: Why can't I send GIFs? Due to spam, GIFs are limited to new members. By levelling up (or boosting), you unlock the ability to use GIFs and play games.

Q: How can I get more colours and roles? Levelling up!

Q: How can I level up? You can level up fastest by posting media (images, videos and GIFs), or speaking in #lounge.

items.title: Contacting Staff
items.text: If you have a serious issue (harassment, bugs, etc.), please Open a Ticket in the #support channel.
